Text:
One, two years old, barely alive...
I encode almost 18 hours every day because I love it and - I cannot do anything else.
I'll hit 1000 encodings in my six months on TPB and 9000 torrents so far, I guess, next week.
I tell you that not to show off, but to show people what could be done if one have right intentions.
You really deserve a VIP skull with so much of ur upload...
Electricity bill is not especially heightened 'cause of that... and rest assured, one of last concerns I have.
Hey is it posibl 4 u to upload th first episode of this show???

@seenoevil47: I DID, last week. First ep. was upped, been here 2-3 hours AND NO ONE downloaded torrent. He was deleted then - and TPB do not allow re-ups (do not ask me why).
However, I'll try to figure something out.
Don't know if this is the right spot to ask, but the first season of Breaking Bad, in your inimitable 20-40 way, would be a magnificent thing to have..!
@laptopdog: I want to but I cannot. Sorry.

No worries 20-40.. it was sweet of you to answer regardless, and thanks again for everything you do upload!

It was my fault - I used to have all the seasons but I stupidly deleted them.. at least I've still got the brilliant season 3.
